llm_raw_response: "ChatResponse(prompt=ChatPrompt(messages=[TextChatMessage(role=<ChatRole.SYSTEM: 'System'>, text='\\nYou are a skilled software developer. It is important for suggestions to not contain the entire function body.\\nEach suggestion consists of the start line, end line, and name for the extracted function.\\nThe JSON should have the following format: [{\"function_name\": <new function name>, \"line_start\": <line start>, \"line_end\": <line end>}, ..., ].\\n'), TextChatMessage(role=<ChatRole.USER: 'User'>, text='280. public void connect(Figure figure) {\\n281.     if (fObservedFigure != null)\\n282.         fObservedFigure.removeFigureChangeListener(this);\\n283. \\n284.     fObservedFigure = figure;\\n285.     fLocator = new OffsetLocator(figure.connectedTextLocator(this));\\n286.     fObservedFigure.addFigureChangeListener(this);\\n287.     if (fLocator != null) {\\n288.         Point p = fLocator.locate(fObservedFigure);\\n289.         p.x -= size().width/2 + fOriginX;\\n290.         p.y -= size().height/2 + fOriginY;\\n291.     \\n292.         if (p.x != 0 || p.y != 0) {\\n293.             willChange();\\n294.             basicMoveBy(p.x, p.y);\\n295.             changed();\\n296.         }\\n297.     }\\n298. }'), AssistantChatMessage(text='[\\n{\"function_name\":  \"updateLocator\", \"line_start\":  288, \"line_end\": 296}\\n]', functionCall=None), TextChatMessage(role=<ChatRole.USER: 'User'>, text='92.  public void mouseUp(MouseEvent e, int x, int y) {\\n93.      if (e.isPopupTrigger()) {\\n94.          Figure figure = drawing().findFigure(e.getX(), e.getY());\\n95.          if (figure != null) {\\n96. It is important for suggestions to not contain the entire function body.\\nEach suggestion consists of the start line, end line, and name for the extracted function.\\nThe JSON should have the following format: [{\"function_name\": <new function name>, \"line_start\": <line start>, \"line_end\": <line end>}, ..., ].\\n'), TextChatMessage(role=<ChatRole.USER: 'User'>, text='280. public void connect(Figure figure) {\\n281.     if (fObservedFigure != null)\\n282.         fObservedFigure.removeFigureChangeListener(this);\\n283. \\n284.     fObservedFigure = figure;\\n285.     fLocator = new OffsetLocator(figure.connectedTextLocator(this));\\n286.     fObservedFigure.addFigureChangeListener(this);\\n287.     if (fLocator != null) {\\n288.         Point p = fLocator.locate(fObservedFigure);\\n289.         p.x -= size().width/2 + fOriginX;\\n290.         p.y -= size().height/2 + fOriginY;\\n291.     \\n292.         if (p.x != 0 || p.y != 0) {\\n293.             willChange();\\n294.             basicMoveBy(p.x, p.y);\\n295.             changed();\\n296.         }\\n297.     }\\n298. }'), AssistantChatMessage(text='[\\n{\"function_name\":  \"updateLocator\", \"line_start\":  288, \"line_end\": 296}\\n]', functionCall=None), TextChatMessage(role=<ChatRole.USER: 'User'>, text='92.  public void mouseUp(MouseEvent e, int x, int y) {\\n93.      if (e.isPopupTrigger()) {\\n94.          Figure figure = drawing().findFigure(e.getX(), e.getY());\\n95.          if (figure != null) {\\n96.              Object attribute = figure.getAttribute(Figure.POPUP_MENU);\\n97.              if (attribute == null) {\\n98.                  figure = drawing().findFigureInside(e.getX(), e.getY());\\n99.              }\\n100.             if (figure != null) {\\n101.                 showPopupMenu(figure, e.getX(), e.getY(), e.getComponent());\\n102.             }\\n103.         }\\n104.     }\\n105.     else if (e.getClickCount() == 2) {\\n106.         handleMouseDoubleClick(e, x, y);\\n107.     }\\n108.     else {\\n109.         super.mouseUp(e, x, y);\\n110.         handleMouseUp(e, x, y);\\n111.         handleMouseClick(e, x, y);\\n112.     }\\n113. }'), AssistantChatMessage(text='[\\n{\"function_name\":  \"computeFigure\", \"line_start\":  94, \"line_end\": 103},\\n{\"function_name\":  \"computeAttribute\", \"line_start\":  96, \"line_end\": 102}\\n]', functionCall=None), TextChatMessage(role=<ChatRole.USER: 'User'>, text='140. protected void clientMain(String[] arguments) {\\n141. \\n142. \\t\\tlibraryLoader = new SteamLibraryLoaderLwjgl3();\\n143. \\n144. \\t\\t// development mode, read Steamworks libraries from ./sdk folder\\n145. \\t\\tSteamLibraryLoaderLwjgl3.configure(getRedistributableFolder());\\n146. \\n147. \\t\\ttry {\\n148. \\n149. \\t\\t\\tif (!runAsClient(arguments)) {\\n150. \\t\\t\\t\\tSystem.exit(-1);\\n151. \\t\\t\\t}\\n152. \\n153. \\t\\t\\tSystem.out.println(\"Bye!\");\\n154. \\n155. \\t\\t} catch (Exception e) {\\n156. \\t\\t\\te.printStackTrace();\\n157. \\t\\t\\tSystem.exit(-1);\\n158. \\t\\t}\\n159. \\t}')]), content='[\\n{\"function_name\":  \"initializeSteamLibraries\", \"line_start\":  142, \"line_end\": 146},\\n{\"function_name\":  \"runClientMode\", \"line_start\":  149, \"line_end\": 153},\\n{\"function_name\":  \"handleClientException\", \"line_start\":  155, \"line_end\": 158}\\n]', function_call=None)"
